background: We have a set of tasks and a set of machines. Each task requires a sequence of operations on machines. We know the order of machines operation for each individual task. We also know the process time of each task on each machine. We want to find the sequence and start time of tasks on each machine to minimize the maximum processing time, i.e., minimize the latest completion time of all tasks.
constraints: the latest finish time over machines
the completion time of the last task on each machine
logical constraint on the start times for a task
Avoid task overlap on each machine
objective: minimize the completion time of all tasks
